faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.content: Here you can find answers to common questions about our service...
faqs.description: Find answers to the most popular questions about our car rental service
faqs.noQuestionsDescription: Try changing your search query or contact support

1.question: Ran out of gas?
1.answer: If you unexpectedly run out of gas on the road, please contact our support service. We will promptly send the nearest mobile team with the necessary fuel so you can continue your trip as soon as possible.

2.question: Why wasn't account access approved?
2.answer: Unfortunately, account access has not been approved at this time. This may be due to non-compliance with one or more security criteria or data verification. We understand this may cause inconvenience and are always ready to reconsider your request. Please ensure all documents are uploaded correctly and meet the requirements, and if necessary, contact our support service - we will be happy to advise what can be done for re-consideration of the application.

3.question: Can't open or close the car?
3.answer: Please first make sure you have a stable internet connection on your device and try the action again. If the problem persists - contact our support service. We will promptly check the situation and help you as quickly as possible.

4.question: Can't complete the rental?
4.answer: Please make sure that: the car is completely closed, all windows and doors are tightly closed, parking mode is enabled, you have a stable internet connection. If all conditions are met but you can't complete the rental - don't worry. Contact our support service and we will help resolve the situation promptly.

5.question: Extra money was charged, what to do?
5.answer: We understand your concern about additional charges. To understand the situation, we recommend taking the following steps: 1. Check the selected tariff: Make sure the charged amount corresponds to the terms of the tariff you used. 2. Evaluate trip time and mileage: Compare actual rental time and distance traveled with calculations in the app. 3. Check for fines or additional services: There may be additional charges for violations of usage rules or for additional services provided. If after these checks you still have questions or believe the charge was unjustified, we recommend contacting our support service.

about.title: About the App
about.content: Our app provides a convenient way to rent cars...
about.description: AZV Motors is a modern car rental service that makes the rental process as simple and convenient as possible. We offer a wide selection of cars and flexible rental conditions.

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.description: We offer the best rental conditions and high quality service

quickRental.title: Quick Rental
quickRental.description: Rental registration takes only a few minutes through the app

flexibleRates.title: Flexible Rates
flexibleRates.description: Choose a convenient tariff: per minute, per hour or per day

support24_7.title: 24/7 Support
support24_7.description: Our support service is always ready to help

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make car rental accessible and convenient for everyone, providing quality service and modern technological solutions. We strive to ensure that every trip with us is comfortable, safe and affordable.

customerOriented.title: Customer-Oriented
customerOriented.description: We are always ready to help and solve any issues

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: High service standards and modern fleet

offer.title: User Agreement
offer.content: This agreement outlines the terms and conditions of using our service...
offer.description: AZV Motors car rental agreement. Familiarize yourself with the terms of service provision.

generalProvisions.title: 1. General Provisions
generalProvisions.item1: 1.1. This document is a public offer and contains all essential terms of the car rental agreement.
generalProvisions.item2: 1.2. Acceptance of this offer is the User's registration in the application and confirmation of agreement with the terms.
generalProvisions.item3: 1.3. After acceptance of the offer, the User is considered to have concluded a vehicle rental agreement with the Company.
generalProvisions.item4: 1.4. This offer is valid until withdrawn by the Company.
generalProvisions.item5: 1.5. The Company reserves the right to change the terms of the offer with notification to Users.

contractSubject.title: 2. Subject of the Agreement
contractSubject.item1: 2.1. The Company provides the User with a car for temporary possession and use for a fee.
contractSubject.item2: 2.2. Car selection is made by the User in the application from available options.
contractSubject.item3: 2.3. The rental period is determined by the User independently at the time of booking the car.
contractSubject.item4: 2.4. The car is provided in good technical condition, fueled.

rightsAndObligations.title: 3. Rights and Obligations of the Parties
rightsAndObligations.item1: 3.1. The User undertakes to use the car carefully and for its intended purpose.
rightsAndObligations.item2: 3.2. The User undertakes to comply with traffic rules.
rightsAndObligations.item3: 3.3. The User undertakes to pay rental services on time.
rightsAndObligations.item4: 3.4. The Company undertakes to provide a technically sound car.
rightsAndObligations.item5: 3.5. The Company undertakes to provide insurance coverage and technical support.

insurance.title: Insurance
insurance.description: All cars are insured under CASCO and OSAGO. The deductible is 50,000 ₸.

techSupport.title: Tech Support
techSupport.description: 24/7 support is available through the app or by phone.

footer.downloadText: The full text of the agreement is available for download in PDF format.
footer.supportText: If you have any questions, contact the support service.

userAgreement.title: User Agreement
userAgreement.description: Terms of use for AZV Motors car rental service

generalProvisions.title: 1. General Provisions
items: This User Agreement (hereinafter - "Agreement") is concluded between AZV Motors (hereinafter - "Company", "we") and the user (hereinafter - "User", "you") of our car rental services.
Use of our services means full agreement with the terms of this agreement.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Service Description
items: We provide car rental services through our mobile and web applications.
Our services include short-term car rental by minute, hour or day.

userObligations.title: 3. User Obligations
userObligations.description: The User undertakes to comply with the following requirements:
items: Maintain cleanliness and proper condition of the car
Immediately report any damage or problems

costAndPayment.title: 4. Cost and Payment
items: Rental cost is calculated based on the selected tariff (per minute/hour/day).
Additional payments may apply for late return, damage or violations.

insuranceAndLiability.title: 5. Insurance and Liability
items: Our cars are insured in accordance with local legislation.
Users are responsible for damage caused by negligence or violation of terms.

rules.title: 7. Usage Rules
items: Use the car only within the permitted territory
Do not transfer control to third parties
Do not use the car for commercial purposes without agreement
Comply with parking and standing rules

footer.agreementText: By accepting the terms of this agreement, you confirm that you have read all points and agree to comply with them.
footer.supportText: If you have any questions, contact the support service.

helpModal.title: What is a Guarantor?
helpModal.definitionText: A guarantor is a person who bears financial responsibility in case of an accident.
howItWorksItems: The guarantor takes financial responsibility for your actions
In case of an accident or other obligations, the guarantor bears financial responsibility
The guarantor must sign the relevant contracts
The relationship between you and the guarantor must be confirmed by both parties
helpModal.iAmGuarantorTab: I am Guarantor: Here you can see requests from people asking you to be their guarantor, as well as a list of people you are already responsible for.
helpModal.myGuarantorsTab: My Guarantors: Here you can add your guarantors and view their status.

deleteTutorial.title: How to Delete Your Account
deleteTutorial.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to permanently delete your account
deleteTutorial.step1Description: First, locate and click on your name or profile section to access your account menu.
deleteTutorial.step2Title: Scroll to Bottom and Click Delete
deleteTutorial.step2Description: Once the menu is open, scroll down to the bottom where you'll find the "Delete Account" option in the danger zone.
deleteTutorial.step3Description: A confirmation dialog will appear. Carefully read the warning and confirm that you want to permanently delete your account.
deleteTutorial.noteText: The delete option is typically located at the bottom of your account settings for safety reasons.
deleteTutorial.warningText: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.
deleteTutorial.demoText: Your account would be permanently deleted in a real scenario.
deleteTutorial.dangerText: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
deleteTutorial.modalText: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently removed.
